Fox News Watch Saturday 2:30 p et Indiana Congressman Mike Pence will not run for president in 2012. In a letter to supporters he writes; In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence has been laying the groundwork to seek Indiana's GOP gubernatorial nomination to succeed Republican White House run and working out details with his wife and family. Mr David Cameron said in a statement: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one.
